description: This vegan chorizo recipe is not only easy to make, but it's packed with flavor and absolutely delicious! It's made using all whole foods and done in 20 minutes.
name: Easy Vegan Chorizo Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cup cooked chickpeas (, about 1 can rinsed and drained)
3/4 cup sun dried tomatoes (, not in oil, dry or in water (see note)
4-5 tsp cumin (, adjust for your preference)
4-5 tsp smoked paprika (, adjust for your preference)
2-3 tsp onion powder (, adjust for your preference)
2-3 tsp apple cider vinegar (, adjust for your preference)
1 teaspoon garlic powder (, or 4 fresh cloves)
1/2 - 1 tsp sea salt (, optional and adjust depending on how salty your sun dried tomatoes are)
1/2 tsp chipotle seasoning (, optional for added spice)

recipeInstructions.text: Put everything into a food processor and pulse until crumbly.
If you want to warm it, saute in a pan with a drizzle of oil to get it crisp around the edges.
